description: This file declares custom memory management functions (mlt_malloc, mlt_free, etc.) used for tracking or debugging memory allocations. It is associated with a specific system resource tool within the project, indicated by the include guards and function declarations.

methods.name: mlt_malloc
methods.description: Allocates memory of specified size, with caller info, file, and line number for tracking.

methods.name: mlt_free
methods.description: Frees memory at pointer with caller info, file, and line number.

methods.name: mlt_realloc
methods.description: Reallocates memory block to new size with caller info for debugging.

methods.name: mlt_calloc
methods.description: Allocates zero-initialized memory for an array with caller info.

methods.name: mlt_strdup
methods.description: Duplicates a string with caller info for memory tracking.

methods.name: mlt_analyze
methods.description: Performs analysis over a specified number of iterations, likely for debugging or leak detection.

methods.name: mlt_reset
methods.description: Resets internal state or counters of the memory tracking system.
